title: Mouse displacement and odd in game graphics and size
body:
After discovering I needed an update of my drivers after re-installing league,
I just cant get the in game GUI to be what I used have set without my mouse
having an displacement issue. On top of regardless of what graphic setting,
the game looks terrible unless i have it in border less mode  rather then
my usual fullscreen. 
I've checked my drivers interface for the optimal settings for the game but it 
doesn't seem to work. 
Any help will be welcomed.

replies.body:
Hey there,

When you say "Mouse Displacement" What are you experiencing?

Thanks for the reply.

I mean say i click on the raptor camp, it send me basically next to tier 1 Mid tower, basically where i click and where i actually go aren't the same

Hey there,

What type of display are you using?
What is this displays native resolution?
What resolution are you currently running league at?

Hey,

Do you mean like fullscreen, bordered and windowed?? If so I'm using windowed.
It should be full screen at 1768x992
But its currently run at windowed 1600x900

I mean, what monitor are you using, although judging by the resolution you stated (1768x992) I'm going to guess you're on a laptop?

Could you try running at that res for me, let me know if that helps.
